```{r 'DDMfigure', fig.cap = "A graphical illustration of the DDM; $\\alpha$ = boundary separation, indicating the evidence required to response 'Creative' or 'Not creative'; $\\beta$ = initial bias as a proportion of $\\alpha$ indicating the tendency to choose one response over the other; $\\delta$ = average drift rate, indicating the rate of information accumulation; $\\tau$ = non-decision time, indicating the time used for processes apart from the actual decision-making.", fig.align = "center", warning = F, message = F}
set.seed(202)
# create random walk
values <- 1.6
current <- 1.6
while(current > 0 & current < 3) {
  current <- current + ifelse(runif(1) < 0.54, 0.1, -0.1)
  values <- c(values, current)
}
samples <- rgamma(1e5,3, 10) + 3

ggplot() +
  theme_void() +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-2, 10)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-2, 5)) +
  geom_path(aes(x = seq(1.5, 6, length.out = length(values)), y = values), color = "darkgrey") +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0, y = 0, yend=0, xend=10), size = 0.7) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0, y = 3, yend=3, xend=10), size = 0.7) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0, y = 0, yend=3, xend=0), size = 0.7) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 1.5, y = 0, yend=3, xend=1.5), size = 0.7) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0, y = 1.6, yend=1.6, xend=1.5), size = 0.7) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 1.7, xend = 4.5, y = 1.75, yend = 2.7), arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.4, "cm")), size = 0.7) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 1.5, y = 1.6, xend = 10, yend = 1.6), size = 0.7, arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.4, "cm"))) +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 9.3, y = 1.8, label = "Time") +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 8.15, y = 2.7, label = "Creative", size = 4) +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 8.5, y = 0.3, label = "Not Creative", size = 4) +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = -0.2, y = 0.1, label = "0") +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = -0.2, y = 2.9, label = expression(alpha), size = 5) +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = -0.32, y = 1.6, label = expression(~alpha*beta), size = 5) +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 1.3, y = 1.8, label = expression(tau), size = 5) +
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 3.5, y = 2.6, label = expression(delta), size = 5)
```
